name: when-is-sunset
description: App to track how much time is left until sunrise/sunset
author: Benjamin Johnson <benjamin.d.johnson@icloud.com>

scripts.deploy-server: git subtree push --prefix server heroku master
scripts.start: concurrently --prefix "[{name}]" --names "CLIENT,SERVER" -c "bgBlue.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "cd client && npm start" "cd server && npm run dev"
